alert.note: Alert for Monroe Upper Keys (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Key West (Key West - The Florida Keys)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 27 at 4:36AM EDT until further notice by NWS Key West
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...The Florida Keys * WHEN...Through early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Excessive rainfall may result in flooding of poor drainage and low-lying locations. Storm drains may become clogged with debris. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Some locations along the island chain have already received 2 to 4 inches of rainfall. An additional 4 to 6 inches of rain with isolated totals to 8 inches is possible through Wednesday morning. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop. Do not attempt to drive through waters of unknown depth.
